gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.legacy.plot

Class Plotter

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.legacy.plot.Plotter

  • public class Plotter
extends Object

    Configurable tool to render data stored in file (or from stdin) to screen frame or to png image file.

    Author:
    Dan Cervelli
